campaign.story:
Read this page in: Deutsch | Русский
120% FUNDED - Thank you!
Stretch goal #1: Fallen Fortress stretch goal unlocked!
Fascinating combat encounter where the player must defend a crashed bomber in the desert against a crowd of raiders.
Stretch goal #2: Free Play mode unlocked!
Encased won’t end when the credits roll. Moreover, the post-completion Free Play Mode will get a number of interesting options, additional quests, events and dialogues.
Stretch goal #3: Upgradable Mobile HQ is unlocked!
An auto-train buried in the sands will appear on the outskirts of the Dome. The hero will be able to capture and restore it, and use it as a mobile base of operations.
$130 000 — Player Vehicles. The desert under the Dome is vast and dangerous. It is much safer, and less exhausting, to travel behind the wheel of your own vehicle.
$130 001 — 1 Combond Encounter. We’re all used to quests of epic complexity being rewarded with superior loot and good money. But what about an adventure that pays a single coin?
$135 000 — Personal Drone Assistants. Robotics is one area where the technologies under the Dome have been successfully implemented.
$145 000 — Gladiator Arena. Having been captured by one of the raider factions, a player may find himself in a real post-apocalyptic coliseum!  
$160 000 — Mod Support. We will create a toolkit with a user-friendly interface to pass along to our players.
$210 000 — Narrative Voiceover. Encased has a lot of stories that could be even better if the “narrator” had a real voice. But we need your help with this.
Learn more about stretch goals in KS Update #21.
Watch latest KS-trailer!
You can include add-ons to help reach stretch goals! Read about add-ons in KS Update #23

You need to pledge CRONUS Corporal tier or above to be able to include add-ons.
- Extra digital copy of Encased - $22 / €18.5
- Alpha Access + Beta - $20 / €17
- Beta Access - $10 / €8.5
- Printed Lorebook - $30 / €25.5 (Shipping costs $4 USA, $6 Rest of the World)
- CRONUS t-shirt $20 / €17 (Shipping costs $4 USA, $6 Rest of the World)
- CRONUS Hoodie $45 / €38 (Shipping costs $4 USA, $6 Rest of the World)
- CRONUS Rogue Baseball Cap $25 / €21 (Shipping costs $4 USA, $6 Rest of the World)
- CRONUS Employee Badge $50 / €42.5 (Shipping costs $4 USA, $6 Rest of the World)
Short Description
The game is set in an alternate 1970's and revolves around the exploration of the Dome, a mysterious structure discovered in a remote desert. No one knows the exact nature of those who built the Dome, but the founders of this advanced civilization have come to be called the Forefathers.
Click to download ultra hi-res
You will discover miraculous technologies and weird artifacts in the labyrinths of the Dome, but that is not all the Forefathers left behind. Watch out for automated security systems, traps, and inexplicable anomalies.
In addition, the Dome itself is showing signs of consciousness. It has been reacting to the human presence since the first explorers entered its domain. Once inside, no one is able to leave. Uncovering the wonders and dangers of the Dome is a one-way road.
Exploration and exploitation of the Dome is carried out by the CRONUS Foundation, a massive organization founded by the world’s most powerful governments.
Narrative
Learn more about the narrative of Encased - in KS-update #14
What the press says
Why Kickstarter?
We want Encased to be just the way you see the perfect CRPG: a huge game, rich in content, sort of “the Fallout of our dreams”, which all of us could be proud of. 
We are developing the game for a while already. We have reached pre-alpha and we are confident that Encased could become a great game. But we are a small team, and there is a lot of things that we’d like to add. With your help, Encased could become a way more ambitious, better fleshed out and polished project!
But it’s not just about the money that could help us expand the game! One of our ground rules is to create games arm-in-arm with our community.
A little bit about where the money will go
Kickstarter and taxes will take away about 10% of the funds. Part of what’s left will be spent on actual implementation and shipping of all the wonderful rewards we’ve come up with. All the rest we will spend on polishing, expanding, and improving the game. That includes a possibly bigger team - one more artist and several designers and scripters - which will spruce up the graphics and increase the number and quality of fights and story interactions. Also, the money will go towards voicework and localization which will make the game more fun and accessible for everyone.
Social Goals
Learn more about social goals in KS-Update #11!
Facebook likes: Like the Encased Facebook page and encourage your friends to do the same!
Facebook shares: share the Encased announcement post on Facebook.
Twitter followers: follow @darkcrystal_hq on Twitter and encourage your friends to too.
Twitter retweets: retweet the announcement tweet from @darkcrystal_hq
Twitter likes: Like the announcement tweet from @darkcrystal_hq
Discord fans: join our Discord group.
The Story
As a new recruit, the player must choose one of five Wings:
Black Wing - military and security forces;
White Wing - scientists, medics and researchers;
Blue Wing - engineers and technicians;
Silver Wing - upper management;
Orange Wing - ex-convicts who have exchanged their prison jumpsuits for the uniform of a CRONUS laborer.
Though your selected Wing grants certain starting bonuses and opens interesting options, your choice does not lock you into a “class”. You are free to develop your character, distribute skill points, and choose abilities as you wish.
Upon completing character creation, you are summoned to Crystal Sands, a city built directly outside the Dome as a staging point for personnel and equipment.
The transition station mounted at the apex of the Dome, above the only aperture, is called the Spire. After basic training, you will descend from the Spire into the Dome to land at Magellan HQ. 
There is much to uncover during your first mission underground…. Relying on your stats and Wing training, you will find there are several ways to resolve each challenge. Replayability is one of our main goals for the game. After your briefing at HQ comes your first task: exploring a newly discovered Forefathers compound tagged Object O-12-Nashville.
After a few adventures inside the Nashville object (which we don’t want to spoil just yet), your group encounters an entirely new anomaly. You awaken something dreaming deep beneath the desert of the Dome. Your trespass has activated Maelstrom, a telepathic entity created to serve the Forefathers. 
All connection with the world outside the Dome is lost and Maelstrom rages across the desert, infecting the minds of everyone it encounters. You and your group fall into a technology-induced stasis for five long years. And when you come to, the entire world has changed. 
Encased combat is inspired by classic, tactical turn-based systems, with a grid overlay, action points, cover system, special abilities, various ammo and damage types, many different resistances, and more!
The player has direct control over his character only. You will manage the behavior and tactics of their your henchmen but their specific actions will be guided by the game’s combat AI system, introducing funny and interesting situations into your battles.
There are dozens of weapons to be found, many of which can be stripped and upgraded. 
The world of the Dome has from its discovery been a place full of weird creatures and dangerous traps. There’s no telling what lies around the next bend in the road, or inside the twilit cave, or beneath the murky waters of the swamp. But who knows? Perhaps humans are the biggest threat in this bizarre land.
Maelstrom dominates everything. It's telepathic rage sowing chaos in the minds of everyone, trapped under the Dome. But the player, having "freed" the entity, enjoys a special relationship with it. The two of you have regular interactions and Maelstrom may even grant "whishes" to the player... but be warned: every call for assistance will eventually incur a price. 
Maelstrom's power grows stronger the closer you move to the heart of the Dome, and that's exactly where you must go to find the answers. There is a special stat influencing interactions with Maelstrom: Psyche. Resistance to Maelstrom's negative effect can be developed in several ways, and develop it you must before you may venture deeper into the Dome. There is also a special skill branch related to Psychic abilities.
We will talk about Maelstrom and gameplay related to it in the future updates.
Following the devastating events of Maelstrom’s release, CRONUS splintered into multiple other, often warring, factions. The world has changed while you were in stasis, but has the nature of Man? Trapped inside the Dome like spiders in a jar, these factions will show the worst and best of humankind. Will you join them, or strike out on your own?
Learn more about factions in our Kickstarter Update #2
If the player chooses to commit crimes against the society, he will incur penalties to his reputation and earn titles ranging from 'Petty Thief' to 'Enemy of the State' or even 'Threat to Humanity'. Crime begets punishment. The player may be fined, imprisoned, and even executed. Luckily, there are several ways to deal with your arrest: bribe judges, organize a jailbreak or return alive from the Labyrinth of Death (this last one may be particularly challenging).
Encased features a day and night cycle with accompanying lighting effects. It would be wise to study NPC routines while adventuring.
The Dome is huge and for the most part is an open sandbox (if you are able to resist the psychic presence of Maelstrom). The map consists of more than 170 sectors, each crafted by hand. There are abandoned bunkers, black caves, the complexes of the Forefathers, as well as wastes, swamps and other biomes.
Random encounters have been a standby of the old-school role playing game since the dawn of the genre. But Encased will bring them to a new level. Each encounter is a separate post-apocalyptic story, not just a bunch of critters attacking you. Want to participate in a game of Russian Roulette? Find a pathway through a deadly anomaly to find a rare relic? Defend an automated rail transport from raiders? Or end up a victim yourself. All this awaits you, in addition to more classic encounters.
Read more about Random Encounters in our Update #5
Guest Stars and Experts!
  Platforms and dates
Encased is being developed for PC, Mac, Linux, PS4, Xbox One and Nintendo Switch. Early Access for the Windows version will likely begin in the first quarter of 2019, exclusively on Steam. The final version will launch during 2019 on Steam, GOG and other services. The console edition is planned for the winter of 2020.
Digital Rewards explained
CRONUS employee ID badge

An employee using your name set out on an expedition in the desert… and vanished. Nothing was found but their badges. The mystery must be solved before it happens again. Will you accept the quest?

Map

A detailed map of the known world under the Dome, showing all the cities and settlements of the Foundation, along with the entries to the ‘objects’, explored and unexplored. Restricted to higher ranks amongst certain Wings, the map also indicates some locations that the Foundation would prefer to keep secret. A gift for those with the time and inclination to explore 30,000 square kilometers of desert.

Lorebook

A digital version of the lorebook, containing all that is known and worth knowing about the Dome and the world within. The story of its discovery, an atlas of its most interesting sites, and an insight into the CRONUS Foundation — including never-before-told stories of some of its more secret projects — this is the only book a dedicated digital Domehead will ever need.

Soundtrack

The hum of a machine of unknown origin, deep beneath the shifting, singing sands. Undeciphered signals from the Tower, snatches of CB radio and a quiet guitar arpeggio in a sleepy roadside bar. In the hands and mind of the Mushroomer — composer for Pathologic 2 — the desert becomes music.

A short story about the Dome

Charlene Putney, writer on the renowned Divinity: Original Sin 2, spins a tale of the events that followed the discovery of the Dome.

Portraits

An extended set of hand-drawn in-game avatars, exclusive to campaign backers.

Closed alpha and beta access

Help test the alpha or beta versions of the game testing. Check out Encased gameplay months before anyone else.

Your nickname in random encounters

Raider gangs inhabit the desert beneath the Dome. In random encounters, the game picks a random name from a database. Your nickname — on our approval — will be one of them.

Baseball card
  Pretty much everyone supports the Crystal Sands Rogues baseball franchise - at least until they lose - and the players’ baseball cards are collected and traded across the Foundation. Recruited from Orange Wing employees with talent and application, under-performing gets you cut from the roster - and getting cut sees you sent into the Dome.

Life Pass

Free lifetime access to all projects released by Dark Crystal Games.

Design a non-generic NPC

Work with the devs to build a character - come up with their name, appearance, and role in the story.

Player portrait

Your face here. We will add a character avatar drawn from your photo to the game, and also give you a digital copy of the image.


An episode of the story-based mini-game, dedicated to you

Games are popular under the Dome too. Some of the miraculously preserved terminals house a popular text game, the hero of which bears your name. Coincidence?

Developers stream

We’ll join you on a livestream of the game, for your audience or ours.

A cool in-game item, exclusive to and chosen by the backers
A rare gun? Custom armor? An unusual combat stim? You, the backers, will decide. But remember, it won’t break the game’s balance. We’re not that generous.

Physical Rewards explained
Blue Wing Engineer t-shirt
In vivid antifreeze blue, this fine t-shirt is the favorite of CRONUS technical staff, from the lowliest technician to the chief engineer. While not standard issue, most Blue Wing employees have one. And now so will you.
Rogues baseball cap
The Crystal Sands Rogues baseball franchise is largely recruited from Orange Wing employees with talent, aggression, and a desire to avoid entering the Dome. Last year’s was a winning season, and none of the players lost their places. But luck shifts like the sands, and this year may be different. And you, the fans, can be less than forgiving.
 Explorer hoodie
The desert is cold at night, so each CRONUS employee who must venture outside is issued with a sweatshirt. Soft and comfortable, it offers excellent protection against the cold, so at least you won’t freeze to death while you die of radiation poisoning.
CRONUS Badge
Printed Lorebook
This 70-page glossy volume contains all that is known and worth knowing about the Dome and the world within. The story of its discovery, an atlas of its most interesting sites, and an insight into the CRONUS Foundation — including never-before-told stories of some of its more secret projects — this is the only book a dedicated Domehead will ever need.
Raider mask
The mask of an insane desert raider, hand-painted by our artists.

Leads
Viacheslav Kozikhin - Project Lead, Alexander Tuzhik - Lead Programmer, Andrey Lyapichev - Art Director, Mark Rhainer - Lead Writer, Konstantin Ivanov - Lead Technical Designer.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
What are the risks and challenges? 

We are developing this game for a while already. However, despite our experience and best efforts, there’s always a chance that something will go wrong. 

1. Early access and release dates. All of the people on our team have already delivered commercially successful games on time and in great condition. However, no true professional will ever tell you, that he is fail-proof. There is always a chance Encased RPG will require to postpone it's set final release date. At least to get an extra coat of polish.

2. We might have delays in delivering our reward promises. The reward delivery channels are extremely reliable, but, there's always a possibility that the reward delivery could be delayed due to technical issues.

3. We are used to dealing with budgets large and small. Financially speaking, Encased RPG budget has been calculated precisely. We are also financing most of the game ourselves, calling community only to finance additional features. However, a drastic change in rates of currency, financial depression, and other unforeseen economic consequences may rob our game of some of the promised content. The odds of that are amazingly low, but it's only fair to mention that as a risk.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
People often suffer from long term mouse use. Traditional mouses with a fix angle will most likely injure or strain your hands after longterm use. Navee is Delux’s latest ergonomic mouse aimed to relieve wrist pains, especially for people diagnosed with CTS and RSI.  
        "I really love it and I love it even more as I used it more and more!" -- Nemanja Sekulic, Tech YouTuber 
"It does fit nicely in the hands, very smooth to control!" -- Chigz Tech Reviews, Tech YouTuber
"This is something I do recommend to people who have carpal tunnel syndrome." -- Zi Reviews Tech, Tech YouTuber
The Navee mouse is fully customizable with up to 20 degrees to best fit your palm. People have different hand shapes and Nevee lets you find what feels most natural to you.  
Navee’s dial is easily accessible by your fingers and thumb compared to traditional scroll. Instead of just your index finger, the control is now shared with the rest of your hand.
With its vertical and ergonomic design, Navee keeps your hand in a natural position while working, preventing you force your wrist causing future injuries.
It’s yours, make it your own. When using a Windows interface with the drive, users can customize up to 6 shortcuts right on the mouse. As for Macs, switch between all your pages by just using the mouse. You can make it use like your own customizable mouse to improve working efficiency.
The Navee mouse comes with three connection options as well as the option to connect it up to three devices. All connection options are wireless, the Navee offers connectivity through a 2.4G USB, Bluetooth 3.0, and Bluetooth 4.0. Pair the mouse with up to three devices with one of these three connection options.
There is a magnetic latch at the bottom for the dongle, it is sturdy and secured.
Not only is it ergonomical, it can shine bright in the dark too. With 16.8 million RGB floating lights and color backlighting, it’s guaranteed to stand out in the day and night.
Designed especially with a rechargeable Li-ion battery, the Navee mouse can last more than a month with a single charge. Full charge the battery for 2.5 hours to get up to 40 days of usage time.
We have equipped it with up to 4000 DPI and 4 adjustable levels: 600-1200-1600-4000. The Navee mouse is highly sensitive and reactive to even the smallest of movements.
Don’t have a mouse pad? No worries, the Navee mouse is fully functional on various surfaces from cloth to granite to even paper. Thanks to its laser LED sensors, it can work on any surface.
It doesn’t matter if you have a Mac, Windows, Android, or Linux, the Navee mouse is fully functional with all. Whether you’re a Mac user or Windows user, the Navee mouse comes with customized shortcuts for each.
Crafted with a layer of fine matte plastic and textured rubberized ABS. Navee’s anti-skid design empowers the users to maneuver through their screens accurately and swiftly.  
As a specialist of ergonomic vertical mouse and keyboard, Delux has developed a sound number of vertical mouse where Navee is crafted in the sense of cumulative experiences.
Go to Delux website to find out more great design product.
The first campaign of Delux Designer - The Perfect Assistant for Designers, funded more than $120,000 on Kickstarter.
Funded in 1994, Delux has more than 24 years of experience in Esports equipment and the R&D, manufacturing, sales, and services experience for A.I. products. Delux has been a long-term Intel strategic partner and have exported products to more than 120 countries worldwide.
Delux’s previously launch Designer keyboard was widely successful in raising more than $132k USD thanks to the supported of over 2,000 people. As an ergonomic tech specialist, Deux has developed a number of vertical mouses. Taking note of previous popular features, our designers created the Navee by combining all these features into a single mouse.
Navee is designed for the best long term comfort. Our team is composed of typists, gamers, and ergonomic experts who have spent years in each perspective fields. After numerous attempts and optimizations, the 6th edition of Delux’s ergo mouse is born.
Navee comes in 2 design patterns to tackle the root of the problems instead of offering you a temporary solution. After several months of prototyping and testing various designs, we finally created Navee as a simple, practical, and portable ergo mouse.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We've spent a lot of time designing a product that meets the highest standards of performance, durability, and convenience. We’ve finalized our production schedule and plans with our own experienced factory to ensure that the Delux Navee can be shipped out as planned. Before launching our project on Kickstarter, we’ve already worked on prototypes that are currently undergoing extensive testing and trial benchmarks to push the devices to their limits to expose any flaws. Our experiences in product development gives us insight into all aspects of the production process, including manufacturing in large volumes and the logistics need to cater to different countries around the world. With our experienced factory, we are confident to handle any foreseeable risks and deliver a low-risk, high-quality product to our backers on time. If anything goes out of control, we’ll be sure to always be transparent and let our backers know what’s going on.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
The world’s first tripod for smartphone, GoPro, Mirrorless and DSLR cameras, designed for speed and ultra-portability. Never leave your tripod behind again.
A quick and simple setup will empower you to take full advantage of every photo opportunity....4 seconds and you’re ready to go.
We got tired of carrying around heavy, bulky tripods that we never ended up using. Lumapod is specifically designed to be brought on all your adventures.
 Instantly capture and share your experiences in the moment.
Of course a fast setup and ultra-compact design are great, but what good is a tripod if it isn’t stable? We carefully selected premium materials like high-grade aluminum and kevlar ropes to ensure reliable stability.
Use it with your Smartphone, GoPro, Mirrorless, DSLR Camera and more...
Easily use it to snap a selfie and then quickly set it down to capture a self-portrait. Either way you can always be in the shot.
When you’re not in the photo, use it as a monopod to shoot lively Hyperlapses
There is more that separates Go85 and Go120 than just their heights (85cm & 120cm). We carefully optimized both models for specific demands.
Lumapod Go85 
We relentlessly designed Go85 to be as compact and lightweight as humanly possible without compromising on quality or performance. The result is a perfect travel buddy for your smartphone, GoPro and cameras that weigh up to 1kg / 2.2lbs.
Unlike Go120, it does not have interchangeable legs. However, it is equipped with integrated terrain levelers to accommodate for those situations with uneven ground.
 Lumapod Go120
Go120 has all the benefits of Go85 but with an overall larger height and build that will support cameras that weigh up to 2kg /4.4lbs.
In addition, Go120 has modular leg extensions which creates a wide-range of possibilities for adaptability. It currently comes standard with terrain leveling extensions.
Easily turn your Go120 into a slider with the add-on dolly wheel extensions.
Or utilize the stake extensions for soft grounds, sand and snow.
                                             Breakdown - Choose Lumapod if you’re looking for better speed, compactness, weight and the adaptability of different leg extensions. Choose a standard tripod if you need extra stability and additional terrain flexibility.
Lumapod is compact with more height, better stability and offers the benefit of having both tripod and selfie mode.
Lumapod offers the same selfie capability but with all the benefits of a stable tripod as well.
Have you ever wondered why all tripods look the same? Is there really only one design that works? We challenged this theory and worked tirelessly to design Lumapod different.
There is a simple mechanical principle behind our design: replace compression parts (traditional legs) with tensioning components (Kevlar Ropes). Perhaps it’s easier to understand when compared to something everyone knows:
Much like how the mast on a sailboat withstands wind with its tensioned ropes, we use the same theory to achieve stability. It’s no rocket science but the key to our design is being able to lock and tension Lumapod in any position.
Lumapod’s stability isn’t just by luck. We did extensive research and testing to measure the vibrations and damping of many tripods. Our electro-mechanical test setup enabled us to optimize Lumapod and ensure it is as stable as possible.
                                             Showing the bigger steps of lumapods development
Hey! We are Lumapod. We are a small start-up located in Austria who love to travel and take photos.
Because we love what we do, the campaign video was made 100% by the team and only with team members and friends. So if you watched it, you may have already seen us.
                                                             Thank you to our existing partners
                This project is promoted by Jellop , the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 500+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $235MM raised between them.

With that said; The Lumapod prototypes used in the campaign might be subject to minor adjustments if improvement with either stability, versatility, design or overall use of the product can be found helpful. 
 
The timeline for production and final delivery have been very carefully calculated based on realistic data and estimations. If, for some reason something changes or alters this timeline, we promise to make it our highest priority to communicate these updates to our backers. In fact, we will monitor and provide updates on all important activities throughout the entire process. Thank you.

The Lotus and the Artichoke - ETHIOPIA
Hi, it's Justin! I'm back on Kickstarter now for my 6th international cookbook project. In 2012, I launched my first project with Kickstarter: The Lotus and the Artichoke - Vegan Recipes from World Adventures, followed by the German edition (Vegane Rezepte eines Weltreisenden) in 2013. The series continued with English and German publications of: The Lotus and the Artichoke - MÉXICO (2014), SRI LANKA (2015), MALAYSIA (2016), and INDIA (2017).
This year I traveled to Ethiopia in the weeks before Easter – one of several special times of fasting, when the majority of the country eats entirely vegan! I explored the central cities, traveled overland to the north, went trekking in the highlands and stayed with families in remote villages. 
As with all my travels and culinary research, I am extremely grateful for the privilege to learn, share & exchange, and be guided & supported by many families and professional cooks who invited me in their kitchens and shared amazing meals with me.
Since returning to Berlin, I've been cooking Ethiopian and Eritrean food practically non-stop, recreating recipes and dishes, constantly inviting friends and guests to my cooking studio for lunch and dinner parties.
Abebech showing me traditional village cooking in the Ethiopian Highlands.
Making injera with the family in Gonder, Ethiopia
The Lotus and the Artichoke - ETHIOPIA is my newest cookbook with original recipes, artwork, photography and stories inspired by these latest culinary adventures. It includes over 70 recipes based on the mouth-watering meals in bustling cities & towns, at road-stop eateries, and in rural highland villages.
As with my previous 5 cookbooks, I have written, illustrated, cooked, photographed, and designed this book myself. The Lotus and the Artichoke is the ultimate combination of my passions: art, travel, vegan cooking, and photography.
The ETHIOPIA Cookbook at a glance:
My 6th cookbook of vegan recipes inspired by my travels, stays with families, and cooking in the kitchens of restaurants worldwide
140 pages with 70+ recipes and over 60 full-page color photos
Personal stories, art, and recipes inspired by my travels and culinary adventures in East Africa
Also based on experiences with international communities of Europe (London, Paris, and Berlin) and North America (Philadelphia, New York, and Washington D.C.) and over 25 years of vegan cooking  
Ethiopian & Eritrean classics, familiar restaurant & family favourites, delicious delights, wonders & surprises, and creative culinary experiments
Discover new flavors, tasty spices, and cooking skills
Great for cooks of all levels, from beginner to advanced: Recipes use easy-to-find ingredients (Cook everything, anywhere!)
Delicious, easy-to-follow recipes designed to satisfy and impress eaters of all ages, tastes, and minds

You, Me, & Kickstarter
Why Kickstarter? Because I love it! Crowdfunding is an awesome adventure. I enjoy the interaction with supporters, other cooks, bloggers, travelers, Kickstarter backers, and people from all over the world that love to dream, and help others with their own dreams.
In 2013, a small, indie publisher in Germany contacted me about being a publishing partner. I soon started working with Ventil Verlag and The Lotus and the Artichoke joined the emerging Edition Kochen ohne Knochen series of vegan & vegetarian cookbooks. It's an incredible partnership, and I enjoy working with an alternative publisher that understands the struggles and challenges for independent authors.
Being with a small publisher, my production costs and expenses for writing, cooking, photographing, illustrating, and designing my own cookbooks are not really covered.
I am passionate about my projects, and know they have a value for many people. I'm here on Kickstarter to ask for your support and involvement, to help continue and evolve The Lotus and the Artichoke project.
Kickstarter LIVE cooking show. 2016.
THE STORY of The Lotus and the Artichoke
In 2012, my first Kickstarter project The Lotus and the Artichoke - Vegan Cookbook was successful with the help of over 360 amazing backers from around the world. It was my first cookbook in a developing series of books featuring my personal stories, photographs, artwork, and vegan recipes inspired by my travels and culinary experiences in 40 countries.
In December, the first edition of The Lotus and the Artichoke - Vegan Recipes from World Adventures was printed: 1000 copies in full color, featuring over 100 recipes and more than 90 full-page, mouth-watering photographs. The Lotus and the Artichoke quickly became an international sensation.
After another successful Kickstarter project in 2013, The Lotus and the Artichoke – Vegane Rezepte eines Weltreisenden was translated and published in German – along with the second English edition.
Later that year, I traveled to Mexico with my partner Julia and our young son Kolja, where we lived in a small town for 3 months, cooking (and surfing) with the locals. I documented our experiences and cooking adventures in my next book, The Lotus and the Artichoke - MÉXICO which was published in English & German in 2014.
The following winter we spent 10 weeks exploring Sri Lanka. The Lotus and the Artichoke - SRI LANKA was published in 2015, following a sucessful third Kickstarter project with over 737 backers from more than 30 countries worldwide.
I traveled around Malaysia, Singapore & Borneo for 5 weeks in early 2016 learning to cook traditional Malay, Chinese, and Indian dishes from the locals. The Lotus and the Artichoke - MALAYSIA was published that year, after another successful Kickstarter with support from all over the world.
In Autumn 2016 and Spring 2017 I went for my 7th and 8th trip to India to for six weeks of research and cooking on location in Kashmir, Ladakh, and the Northeast States. The Lotus and the Artichoke - INDIA was my most successful Kickstarter project, with support from 1,165 backers in over 40 countries.
Since 2013 I have devoted almost all of my working hours to The Lotus and the Artichoke and other projects in the culinary field. In addition to writing my own cookbooks, I offer international vegan cooking classes, cooking demonstrations & shows, write recipes and do photography for other cookbooks and magazines. I also love to help others with translations, photography, design, and advice on their own projects – almost always dealing with art, travel, and food.
Lagos, Nigeria (World Veg Fest 2014)
PRAISE for The Lotus and the Artichoke
"The Lotus and the Artichoke spiegelt Justins Erlebnisse und seine Liebe zum Reisen und Kochen so nahbar und umfassend wider, dass man so manches Mal meint, selbst dabei gewesen zu sein!" – Nicole Just, Bestsellerautorin von La Veganista
“The Lotus and the Artichoke shares Justin’s love for cooking and world travel with such intensity and passion that you really feel like you were there!” – Nicole Just, bestselling author of La Veganista
"Unser allerliebster verrückter Weltreisender ist wieder da!" – Nadine Horn & Jörg Mayer, Bestseller-Autoren von eat this! Vegan kann jeder
"Ein fantastisches Buch, das nicht nur den Hunger, sondern mindestens ebenso doll das Fernweh weckt!" – Sarah Kaufmann, Autorin & Weltreisende von Vegan Guerilla and Outdoor Cooking
"A fantastic book that totally fires up your appetite and wanderlust!" – Sarah Kaufmann, Author & World Traveller from Vegan Guerilla and Outdoor Cooking
"Whether you're living life in paradise or trapped in the middle of the zombie apocalypse, the recipes in The Lotus and the Artichoke will make you feel as if you traveled to the unique places that inspired them." – Jon & Chris, The Vegan Zombie YouTube stars and authors of Cook & Survive!
"The Lotus and the Artichoke will open your mind to new tastes, new lands, and new adventures. I enjoy making these recipes with my family and teaching my young children how simple food choices have a profound impact on our health, the lives of animals, and our planet." – Kristen Palana, Aura's House & Veggie Propaganda

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Kickstarter and crowdfunding can be crazy, messy, and dangerous. From tripled postage costs and doubled production expenses to unforeseen delays, partnership breakdowns, and other surprises – lots can happen! I should know. In the last 6 years, I've supported over a hundred campaigns by others, run 5 successful Kickstarter campaigns of my own, plus created and managed 3 more in the vegan/culinary scene, and consulted on over a dozen others behind the scenes.

Yes, I've got lots of experience with lots of stuff, but I also know when it's time to bring in others for help. I'm grateful for the incredible network of supporters and helpers I've got to make all of this happen, and make it awesome.

Crowdfunding is all about communication. The most important thing is to be honest and stay in touch. I'm here to involve you the process, keep it fun and entertaining, and make sure you get MORE than you expect.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Delivery Day!
Actually the delivery of my shipment of the new cookbooks was planned for Tuesday... but things kinda never go according to plan around here! Monday morning I got a phone call that the delivery truck was on my street – a day early – so I raced home on my bike (in the pouring rain) to meet the newest additions to The Lotus and the Artichoke cookbook family.                                Product Warranty
Here at Chirp, we stand behind all of our products. The Plexus Wheel+ comes with a lifetime warranty. If we can't fix or repair a manufacturing defect, we will replace the product, no questions asked.
Return policy
We offer a 100 day no risk return policy. If you are not 100% satisfied with the quality of the product within 100 days of receiving your order, simply send it back and we will refund you, no questions asked. But don't worry, we know you are going to love it!
Customs & duties information
Chirp cannot mark orders as gifts. This is illegal, so we will not be able to do this.
Our prices DO NOT include VAT, GST or other country taxes.
As many of you know, our terms of sale for international orders are FOB destination. This means that you pay all freight and duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Kickstarter.
For international customers who are required to pay customs, you will receive an email from USPS, FedEx, DHL, or your local customs authorities asking for payment to have your order processed through customs. Unfortunately, there is no legal way around customs. Once you make that payment to the customs broker your order will be processed for final delivery.
Shipping procedure
Within 24 hours of your order being shipped, you will receive a tracking link with your shipping details. When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package. We use a shared post shipping method to have your order delivered at an affordable price. Your order will ship out from our shipping facility in Orem, UT with a major shipping company, such as USPS, UPS, FedEx, DHL, etc.
Your order will be handled by USPS, UPS, FedEx, or DHL up to the entry of your country. Once your order enters your country your order will be handed off to your local post office for final delivery. International transit will have a 7-21 Business day delivery time. U.S Domestic shipments will take 3-7 business days.
Shipping policy
If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address, moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking #, please keep an eye out for the package. 
This project is promoted by Jellop, a direct­ response online advertising agency specializing in Kickstarter campaigns on Facebook Ads and Google AdWords.

campaign.story:
Hi there, adventurer! Looking for more dice in some unique designs and colors? You're in a good place!
Some of you may already know that Q WORKSHOP is the manufacturer of some pretty unique RPG dice. We've been around for 14 years now, and we've produced so many dice sets that we've lost count already ;)
Throughout the years we’ve also created some dice designs that we loved but didn’t make for various reasons: too many already scheduled releases, license ideas that just didn’t work out, and so on. It hurt us deeply to have them hidden - and now we can finally give them a chance!
We're starting with 5 designs in one color version each. More to come!
No, these are not black blank dice ;) We will ask you to choose the design and color of the dice sets after the campaign ends - in our Pledge Manager. You've got time until then to decide!
The mat's format is B3 (353mm x 500mm, or 13.9in x 19.7in), and it's got Emil's awesome artwork on one side and a solid rubber on the other.
And yes, you can also follow him on Instagram :)
Also, he's the guy who invented the famous April Fool's prank with the Furry dice.
Here are some pictures of the real dice!
The Arcade dice feel the game! This is a real pic, not a render :)
Arcade Dice - real pic detail
The Bloodsucker dice all ready! Real pic, not a render
Bloodsucker dice - real pic detail
Are you joining the fight? The Dragon Slayer dice are waiting!
Dragon Slayer - real pic detail
Halloween dice - detail
Halloween is comiiing! Real pic, not a render
Wizard Dice - charming already!
Wizard Dice - real pic detail
Choose the Pledge Level - at this point, you only choose the quantity of the sets that you wish to order. They all have the same price. You'll choose the designs and colors in the Pledge Manager AFTER the campaign. You can pay the exact amount needed, or add an extra for some add-ons. You can also increase your pledge in any moment of the campaign.
You can get one additional die at no extra cost, if you subscribe to our newsletter here.
If you want to get some add-ons, you can change your pledge during the campaign - either by jumping to a different pledge level, or increasing the pledged amount.
Your credit card will be charged after the campaign ends. Kickstarter then has up to 14 days to collect the payments, and after that it transfers the money to us so that we can start the production.
Well, we've had some experience with it, and it is really a great place to be 100% sure that our product meets the customers' requirements. In this project, we just give you the options - and you tell us what you want. Isn't that the perfect solution?
Also, we just love the community feeling that arises around the campaign. There's some magic in it!
Our dice are made of polymer: injection-molded and then painted. Each die is then polished and undergoes a thorough quality control.
The design is engraved in the dice, not just painted on the surface :)
So, you've found the most interactive section in this campaign! As the funding goal is not so high, we wanted to spice things up a bit and to offer you some opportunities to have fun.
So here they are - our Community Goals!
You'll find all the links in the buttons below!
How does it work?
Once a Community Goal is reached, the dice set with a specific design gets the matching dice bag. It's that simple.
A maximum of 1 bag of each design will be added for free to each backer order.
You don't need to pay any extra cash or advise us in any way, we'll add the bags automatically to your order. If we manage to reach the goals only partially, (for example, we unlock 3 out of 5), only these sets will get their bags.
So, for example, if you order 3 sets (and let's assume that all bags are unlocked during the campaign), here's what happens:
- if you choose to have 1 x Bloodsucker dice set, 1 x Wizard and 1 x Halloween Pumpkin, you'll get a matching bag for each one of those.
- if you choose to have 3 x Bloodsucker dice sets, we'll only add 1 Bloodsucker bag to your order. You can also purchase the bag as a regular add-on, of course.
The unlocked bags will also appear as add-ons, so if you like them a lot, you can get more!
You'll find the link to the newsletter here.
Already subscribed to out newsletter? That's cool. We will compare the two databases after the campaign ends and if your e-mail is there, we will add the bonus D20 to your pledge.
 You can find them here :)
August-September 2018 - campaign
Second half of September 2018 - campaign wrap-up: collecting pledges and importing the data to the Pledge Manager
October 2018: filling out the info in the Pledge Manager
November 2018 - January 2019: production
February 2019: fulfillment!
For our US backers: In the Pledge Manager you'll be able to choose between the more economical USPS shipping or more secure Fedex. Both shipping methods will have tracking available.
The shipping rates might go up depending on the final weight of the pledge and/or the add-ons that you add to your pledge.
Please bear in mind that these shipping rates are orientative only. The exact shipping rate will be charged in the Pledge manager after the campaign.
As with the previous campaign, we will organize the shipping for all US pledges from a US warehouse. The goal is to spare our backers the unnecessary customs fees. Once we know the exact quantity and weight of the packages, we will crunch the possibilities and decide on a one that is both reliable and fast.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We've created and fulfilled two Kickstarter projects so far - the first one was fulfilled within a year, and the second one in seven months. We've got our own factory and warehouse in Poland, Europe, so the production is 100% under our control. We've got 14 years of experience in making dice, so we can assure you that every possible problem that might occur during the dice production has already happened to us, and we've dealt with it - including a fire in the factory, which is a thrilling story that we might tell you some day, by the way.
So, unless something definitely "force majeure" happens (like the zombie apocalypse, or the Spanish Inquisition), you will get your dice sooner rather then later. We pinky-promise!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
2 years ago, we brought you The World's Smallest EDC Flashlight. We wanted to shake up the Everyday Carry market by providing awesome, minimal products everyone can use on a day-to-day basis. Introducing NanoPen, the pen that goes where you go.
When we say "World's Smallest", we mean it. Measuring in at a staggering 5cm in length, and 0.75cm in diameter, nothing else on the market comes close with the portability we offer.   
It's pretty F*CKING strong. Try to break it if you can. 
This material is superior because it is particularly resistant to deforming. It's Mohs Hardness is rated at 9 which is higher than Titanium and Steel.  
Using a Tungsten Carbide tip, this pen is more than just a writing instrument. We've tested the NanoPen thoroughly to ensure that it is a perfect EDC tool for the toughest tasks.
Have a neat idea? Sketch it out with ease. Fill out forms on the go. Puncture bothersome plastic packaging. Heck, even cut open all those Amazon boxes- The options are endless.  
The tungsten carbide ball is designed to be a perfect sphere that can grip any writing surface. Its surface is actually composed of over 50,000 polished surfaces and pits connected by a series of channels throughout the entire sphere. This design allows the ink to be present on both the surface and interior of the ball.  
At Slughaus we believe in pushing boundaries and elevating overall design & functionality in peoples lives. It's more than just a pen that fits on your keys, its a simpler way of living.  
The earliest design we have of a pen dates back to the late 1800's. These pens smudged easily and would leak, voiding them unusable. Fast forward to 1945, the ballpoint pen design we know today was perfected and patented.
In 2018 we like doing things differently, making the traditional ballpoint pen sleek and minimal, for you to carry ANYWHERE effortlessly.  
When we say take your EDC further, we mean take it with you anywhere and everywhere. We aren't a traditional Every Day Carry brand. We like to get creative and give new meaning to the way you carry things.
   Hook it on to your backpack, duffel, or keychain to ensure you never forget a pen when you're traveling on-the-go.
Add it to your favorite jacker zipper, and utilize it as a zipper pull.  
Need less bulk on your Keys? Add it to a traditional ballchain and wear it as a necklace.  
Never lose your pen again.   
      They say that size doesn't always matter. But it does when it comes to EDC.  
     We've considered every possible aspect of the NanoPen from the size ratio of the key ring to body, to the finish of the metal to ensure proper grip when in use. We started from a standard pen and reduced it to an extremely minimal design, while giving it infinite function.
In order to perfect the NanoPen we had to go through various vigorous testing and revision. We worked with multiple pen manufactures to ensure our design was perfected to be the best tiny ballpoint pen on the market. Truly, there's nothing out there like it.  
   SLUGHAUS is a small company based out of San Francisco with the sole mission of helping you stay minimal and functional. We believe that your everyday carry essentials influence your lifestyle. NanoPen's elegance inspires innovation, while its functionality keeps you on-the-go. We hope that our products not only help keep you minimal, but help mold your lifestyle as a whole.

campaign.story:
This project was launched especially on Father's day to celebrate the Fathers, Kings, Leaders, Teachers, and those who have guided us in life.  This project was created as my own personal reminder, and to "hang" on to the memories that pushes us forward.   
" To all you fathers and fathers-to-be, and to all of you, who dedicate themselves to the coming generations.  This project is dedicated to you!" 
Hi Everyone!  In the blink of an eye, over 2 year's have gone by, and I find myself back here on Kickstarter once more. With this new project, I decided to go with something simple.  Titanium and EDCs are still my obsessions, so that's where the focus will be. I hope the design of the HANDGREY™ KIN will strike a chord with you all.
DESIGN PHILOSOPHY
The HANDGREY™ KIN is my take on the simple key hook EDC, for your pocket, belts, belt loop, purse, messenger bag, or pretty much anything you want to hook your keys on to.
I still rely on the bauhaus philosophy as my inspiration.  From then on, I let the lines and functions evolves.  The "feel" of the materials and the functions it serves, guides me toward the final outcome.  In this case, it  took on the design cues and curves, that harken back to the industrial era & machinery of the 1960s. 
With a number of variations & iterations on the drawing board, I narrowed the final design to 2 different versions / models:  KIN {No.6}, and KIN {No.9}  
There are no functional differences between the 2, only aesthetics.  I like how the 2 models feel in my hands.  No.6 felt more modern, and streamlined, while No.9 felt more mechanical and succinct.  
This new series will retain my signature unibody design, with precision details. Each piece is individually cut via EDM WIRE-CUTTING technology, solely from Grade 5 / Ti-6Al-4V Titanium. This the most detailed and precise production method available.  It is very expensive, and usually reserved for prototypes and precision tooling only.  You can't get much better than this when it comes to cutting. 
 FEATURES
Simple hook with semi flexible spring clip
Extra large inner clearance for hooking on thicker objects
Unique micro-grip design to create a subtle grip.
Premium Grade 5 / Ti6AL4V titanium 
SLOW EDM wire-cutting for the finest precision details
Combination of Machine & Hand finishing, for best appearance
Handgrey KIN + the ORBITKEY {canvas}
        I will also be offering the pledges with the option of adding my Handgrey KNOX custom Titanium Key Ring.  This will be available to backers after the project ends.  
Handgrey KNOX
FINISHING
I will be making the KIN in 2 finishes:
Sheen - Stone Tumbled Finish 
Bright - Hand Brushed Finish
Stone tumbling comes in many different interpretation.  It sounds very simple, but quality finishes are very hard to nail down, and the machinery needed are very expensive.  It takes a lot of time to do quality work.  I strive to find the perfect balance that gives good results, with a faster production time. 
I prefer the natural color of Titanium above all else, simply because it's everlasting. It's the way nature made it. Anodization, and PVD / DLC coating are nice, but not very durable, no matter what the marketing says. I've worn through them all.   In the future, if I manage to find a better long lasting coating, or finishing process, I will offer a larger variation of final finishing for my design.  
Dedication ~ Fathers & Kings
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
I've been around Kickstarters for nearly half a decade with numerous project. You don't last this long by not delivering. The 10,000+ backers from my previous projects will attest to this.

The only risk I can foresee realistically, is TIME. There are factors that are beyond my control, such as delivery time for raw materials or turn around from our EDM manufacturers. Things happen, machines break, shipments get lost, etc., but we have enough experience to minimize and mitigate these factors to ensure that the project is not significantly affected. I will also get started much earlier than I did on the last project just to be on the safe side.

I will be working with the same EDM and machining specialist in Thailand that I have worked with the last 4 years. These GURUs know how I work, what I need from them, and that I mean what I say. So I will continue to have them do what they do best: Exceptional Quality Work!

campaign.story:
The Ergo Spout is the world's first ergonomic spout and handle for mason jars.  Transform regular mouth mason jars into a comfortable pouring pitcher without the mess!  Pour hot liquids safely!  Lift large jars easily!
First invented and patented in 1858, the Mason jar is named after its inventor, John Landis Mason.  Originally used in home canning and preserving, the Mason jar has become ubiquitous due to its usefulness. The jar is used for drinking, storage, canning or crafts.  The one thing that sets the Mason jar apart is its standard mouth size.  The regular mouth Mason jar is 2.75 inches (6.985 centimeters) across the top.  The Ergo Spout will fit regular mouth Mason jars, from 12 ounces to half gallon volumes.
The Ergo Spout fits Mason jars whether they were recently manufactured or are of vintage age. This is only for regular mouth Mason jars. 
The Ergo Spout with different sizes of jars.
The Ergo Spout has three physical parts:  
The lid is completely removable. It connects inside the spout, creating a hinge for flip-top functionality.
The main spout has a curved lip to reduce dripping and connects to a handle that is comfortable and non-slip.  
A gasket is underneath where the jar comes into contact with the spout.  This provides a complete seal, so there is no leaking between the base of the spout and the top of the mason jar.  
The Ergo Spout could become your favorite kitchen tool because of its versatility.  Use it with pint jars to drizzle homemade salad dressings or breakfast syrups.  Add the Ergo Spout to a quart for easy pouring of juice or serving gravy to your crowd.  Attach one to your vintage half gallon jar to brew your sun tea or lemonade.
The Ergo Spout will be made of food-safe polypropylene, which is BPA and phthalates free.  The material provides the strength to lift heavy jars.  It will not warp in the high temperatures of the dishwasher and microwave.
The Ergo Spout solves three basic problems with Mason jars.  
First, because Mason jars are glass, they become slippery when wet.  With the Ergo Spout you can avoid those slippery jars and pour without the risk of dropping it.  
The Ergo Spout also allows the possibility of pouring hot liquids such as syrup.  Because your hand need not come in contact with the jar, you can safely pour that hot syrup on your pancakes.  
Last, the Ergo Spout prevents sticky drips down the side of the jar by guiding the liquid to the curved spout.  
The Ergo Spout makes for comfortable, safe pouring without the mess.
We have been showing off the Ergo Spout and its development on social media. We are so happy with the love the Ergo Spout has been getting.  Back us today to get your very own Ergo Spout for your kitchen.
The Ergo Spout will come in your choice of three colors: Vintage Blue, Classic White or Barn Red.
                SHIPPING INFORMATION:
For those who live in the United States, shipping will be added to your pledge and charged upon successful completion of the campaign.
International folks!  As of the launch date we have determined that we will be able to ship to the following other countries at the estimated shipping prices.  Shipping will not be charged as part of your pledge to Kickstarter, but instead will be charged after the campaign is complete and prior to shipping.
Canada (estimated shipping ~$18 USD)
U.K. (estimated shipping ~$25 USD)
Australia (estimated shipping ~$18 for 1 Ergo Spout, ~$25 USD for 2 or 3)
If you don't see your country listed, please contact us and we will review policies and costs for shipment to determine whether we will be able to add you to the list.
IMPORTANT:  International shipping costs do not include custom fees, taxes, duties or other charges for the product to enter your country.  Please take into account any additional amounts that you may have to pay in order to receive the product and ensure that the imported product complies with your national and local laws.
Stretch Goal #1 Once we reach $30,000, we will add a fourth color option. Backers will be able to vote on this color choice. The top color by number of votes wins! Woot Woot!  
Stretch Goal #2 If we reach $50,000, we are adding two additional color options (for a total of six for the campaign)!  There will be a second round of voting with colors added from backer suggestions.
Stretch Goal #3 If we hit $70,000, we have a surprise for our backers.  We will reveal the surprise once we hit the $50,000 goal.  Don't worry, you're going to love it!
When my oldest son was younger, he LOVED pancakes with syrup. It might be more accurate to say that he loved syrup with pancakes. We went though A LOT of syrup at our house.  
My mother-in-law had taught me how to make a simple syrup with maple flavoring. It became a family favorite because it's easy, delicious and economical. She also gave me a fancy syrup dispenser. I loved it and used it all the time. Until...  
One day I chipped the edge while washing it. I searched the internet for a replacement, but couldn't find one. 
Then came the light bulb moment: wouldn't it be great if there were a spout and handle for Mason jars!  I looked all over for that too, but couldn't find it.  My husband, Bryce, and I decided to make one ourselves. 
Now, after laboring over a ton of versions for the last 18 months, we finally have it ready to manufacture.  We are ready to bring you the Ergo Spout!
Why do you call it the Ergo Spout?  

Because of the unique ergonomic handle.  
What about a wide mouth version?  

Due to interest we have decided to launch the Wide Mouth Ergo Spout with it's own Kickstarter campaign.  After the design, engineering and prototyping is done we will be ready to launch.  Look for it Spring 2019! 
What will it be made of?  

The Ergo Spout will be polypropylene.  Polypropylene is a food safe, non-toxic, BPA-free and Phthalates-free plastic. It will also have a silicone grippy over mold on the handle.  
Is it dishwasher and microwave safe?  

Yes. The plastic will not warp in the high heat of a dishwasher or a microwave.  
Is it air tight or does it seal?  
The Ergo Spout includes a silicone gasket to make a complete seal between the jar and the base of the Ergo Spout. We are working to make it as spill-resistant as possible with our flip-top lid. 
Is it dripless?  
The spout's design reduces dripping and will help prevent drips down the side of the jar. 
Are there different colors available?  
Yes, we are offering it in Vintage Blue, Barn Red, and Classic White. We will offer another color as stretch goals.  If the campaign achieve a stretch goal of $30,000 Backers will get to vote on the extra colors.
                                                     Do you like the Ergo Spout video? McKay Kriser did a phenomenal job for us! You can reach McKay at silvercubepictures@gmail.com if you would like him to help with your video, too.

Find the Smart Water Bottle PRESS KIT here 
As little as 2% loss of our bodies’ water content begins to cause the brain to lose alertness and the body to feel tired.
Drinking water is one of those simple daily routines that we forget about too often. And while most recommendations focus on how much water we need to drink, not enough is said about how often you should be sipping on your water. The frequency and even distribution of your water intake during the day is actually the key to preventing dehydration.   
The new EQUA Smart Water Bottle is here to take your water intake – and overall wellbeing – to the next level.
It glows every time you need to take a sip of water  
Once you’re thirsty it’s already too late. EQUA will make sure to send you regular reminders every time its needed in order to prevent your dehydration.
Knows your optimal daily water intake
You’re an individual and you need a personalised plan for your optimal water intake. EQUA’s APP will do that for you and become your healthy lifestyle coach.
Tracks how much water you had
Once you start following your water intake you’ll find that on the days when you reach your daily goal, you’ll feel more energised and more friends will comment on your glowing skin.
Communicates with you, even without the use of your phone
A gentle tap on the bottle will reveal how well you are doing - with a slow glow if you’re on track or a quick glow if you need to catch up.
A companion mobile app for the EQUA Smart Water Bottle will help you keep close track of your hydration. The app recommends your daily water intake according to your body characteristics and lifestyle. It tracks your water intake and offers you an insight look in your hydration habits and analytics. You can also control the frequency of glow reminders on the bottle that will remind you when you need a sip of water.
Help us spread the word about EQUA Smart Water Bottle among your family and friends. We will randomly choose 100(!!) of you that’ll share our campaign on Facebook, Instagram or Twitter and thank you with a free personalisation of your new EQUA bottle (please see FAQ section for terms & conditions).
Combining smart technology with a sleek, attractive design, EQUA is crafted in three color options: Snow White, Dark Grey and Pink Blush.
Using EQUA bottle will not only have an amazing impact on your wellbeing, but will drastically improve your environmental impact. While bottled waters are conveniently available at our every step, too often we’re not aware of the scary fact that plastic has been mass produced only since 1950’s but we already have a mere 9.2 billion tons of plastic waste to deal with. A switch from disposable to reusable water bottle is a simple step with a big impact!
There are many possibilities how to measure your water intake with the help of the bottle and the app. For us the real challenge was to build the right technology with the best user experience. Our goal was to make the hardware part small, durable, functional and packed in a beautiful design. Our choice of technology was the motion sensor (accelerometer). The accelerometer is able to recognize your movements and calculate the amount of water you drink.
How it works?
PLAY

The main innovation is in its software. We have developed a clever algorithm to understand specific bottle movements. We then use machine learning technology to translate these movements into useful data. This means that the bottle and the app will improve its accuracy through time and through use.
Behind the scene
EQUA bottle contains some very smart electronic parts which unfortunately can sometimes come with a bug :( For those cases, we offer a 1 year limited warranty! Which means we’re giving you enough time to let us know if your bottle arrived with a factory mistake. Our team will do our best to assist your case in the shortest time possible with as little fuss as possible.
                       
It's a great pleasure working and creating with such a great team.

You guys are the best! 

We also couldn't have done it without the support of our friends. A special thank you goes to: Borut Kumperscak - development, Jure Jazbec - hardware development, Izidor Makuc - firmware development, Jani Mahne (Izstop) - software development, Bright Visuals - video production, Jaka Birsa - photography, Mak Kordic and CNJ team – app UX design.

Thank you!
Anze Miklavec and Stella Korosec, Co-founders

campaign.story:
Hi, we're Swiftpoint!  We've been developing award-winning products that push the boundaries of ergonomic mouse design and function for over a decade. This is our third Kickstarter, and thanks to our incredible supporters, we've previously raised over a million dollars in pledges - bringing our products to life.      
We’ve gone back to the drawing board on our ergonomic pen grip mouse (Swiftpoint GT), improved everything that people loved, and added more innovative features. We're starting production and are super excited to announce Generation 3 of our pen grip mouse, called ProPoint™
Kickstarter Exclusive Bundle - unbelievable value! 
We want to launch the product with a huge splash and reward our early supporters. So to get it into as many hands as possible to spread the word, we’ve put together a bundle that is surely the craziest and best offer Kickstarter has ever seen (short of giving it away!)
UPDATE: Due to the amazing support, we've also been able to include a USB-C to USB adapter, free of charge to ALL backers!
Double up, and save even more...
                                      Do you feel discomfort from your current mouse, or know someone who does?  
Whether it's relieving current strain or pain, or prevention before it becomes an issue, your health is important...
Ultimate Travel Mouse 
If you’re sitting on a sofa with your laptop, in a cafe, on a plane, or in a train or bus - this is where ProPoint™ shines - you can use it right on your laptop palmrest.  
When you need to walk to a meeting or your next class, just close your laptop and attach your Propoint™ to the magnetic parking spot on the lid.
You can connect via Bluetooth, or with the USB receiver (which also charges the mouse). 
                                Take Command of your Presentations
Not only is ProPoint™ the most comfortable mouse in the world, but with our gyro technology it's also a “presenter” - meaning it’s actually two devices in one.
Stand tall with the ProPoint™ in-hand, and flick the switch to transform it into the ultimate presenter device. 
Navigate your slides and lead your audience through your presentation with the virtual laser pointer, you can even draw on the screen to highlight what matters most.
...not only a mouse, it's also a presenter device
Finally! A mouse for your iPad
Precision and Gestures for Designers & Power Users 
ProPoint™ not only gives you the full functionality of a three-button mouse and scrollwheel but, with our unique gyroscope technology, it opens up a new world of tilt gestures for panning, zooming and rotation.
Unlike other mice that use the scrollwheel for middle mouse clicks, ProPoint™ has a dedicated 3rd mouse button that’s easy to click.
You can assign separate functions to all three buttons when the device is tilted, so there’s actually 6 button actions right at your fingertips. Assign shortcuts to the tilt gestures, like app switching, and the actions you use the most. 
In office programs like Word and Excel, use tilt gestures to effortlessly flick up / down, or even left / right. 
In design programs like Photoshop and Illustrator, flick to the area you need to work on - without even pressing a button. 
In 3d modeling programs, use tilt-gestures to effortlessly rotate, zoom and pan.
Propoint™ is the ultimate tool for designers and power users, in the office or on the go.
                                   Tech Specs
We kept all the things people loved about Swiftpoint GT ...
We improved everything, and packed in even more innovative features ...
Our Story 
We’ve been developing revolutionary products for almost 15 years and have a unique design ethic that starts with a clean slate, followed by an analysis of every minute detail of how we interact with our devices to complete daily computing tasks. 
We put our designs and concepts through countless cycles of user testing and refinement - this gives us a deep understanding of ergonomics, efficiency, and intuitiveness, to create truly unique and innovative products.  
We're not only an ideas company, our team has decades of experience in manufacturing, production, sales, and logistics, and we've shipped tens of thousands of products to every country in the world.
Everything we do is about making innovative and robust tools made to the highest build quality that we’re proud to put our name on. Devices that make peoples lives easier and more enjoyable.
Last year we launched ‘The Z’ - a gaming mouse that was voted gaming innovation of the year by CES.
Before that, we launched our ergonomically designed pen-grip mouse the ‘Swiftpoint GT’, which went on to become computer peripheral of the year.
Now we’re launching ProPoint™ which is our next generation Swiftpoint GT device. Take a look at this (raw / uncut) tech video, to see it in action!
PLAY

Please help us by sharing with the people you know :)
Special thanks to these great teams who are helping us spread the word. . .
This Project is International Shipping (and Customs) Friendly
We have fulfillment warehouses worldwide, meaning rewards bound for the US, EU, Canada, Australia, and NZ will ship from within their region with no additional customs charges. For other regions, packages will be declared at a value that would typically come under customs thresholds. Please check with your local authority if you are unsure.

updates.update_content:
Hello Swiftpoint backers,
Today we're very excited to announce our 5th crowdfunding campaign! 
TRACER is Swiftpoint's latest premium gaming mouse, designed to help you play better and win more! With feedback from our previous 2017 CES gaming innovation of the year mouse, The Z, we were motivated to deliver on three key user requests when creating TRACER;
 Awesome Driver Software: powerful, yet intuitive & easy-to-use
 Auto-Game Detection: play straight out of the box
  premium unique features - amazing price

Hi Backers, 
Just in case you missed it - we’re excited to announce that the newest member of our pen-grip range has launched on Kickstarter and was fully funded in under 20 minutes! TRACPOINT is the ‘baby brother’ of ProPoint and was developed in response to your feedback. TRACPOINT offers fantastic value to the traveler, road warrior and frustrated trackpad user.

Hi Backers, 
We have just released a new update for the Windows Control Panel which addresses some bugs. You can download it here.  
This update comes with a revised UI – Making it easier to access the controls you want in a more logical manner. To see the full list of updates head over to our driver support page.

Hi Backers,
With over 5,000 ProPoint mice sold across several crowdfunding platforms, and more being ordered every day, managing logistics has been a complex and ongoing task for our small team. Every day since we began shipping at the end of December we’ve processed and shipped ProPoint all over the world. Today, after two and a half months, I am happy to confirm that we have all but completed ProPoint fulfillment.

Hello Backers,
You’ve heard me mention that Swiftpoint are committed to ongoing software and firmware updates to not only improve ProPoint’s stability but also continue to make our software even better.
Today I’m happy to announce that we have recently released an update for the Windows Control Panel which allows you to assign keyboard shortcuts to individual gestures. This means that you can assign shortcuts such as Copy and Paste to your mouse - you will love it! You can find this new feature under the “Center Button Settings” and “Rear Buttons Settings” tabs, within the Control Panel.

updates.update_userinfo: New Firmware Update Methods Available Now!
updates.update_content:
Greetings Backers,
Thanks for all the feedback you’ve given us about ProPoint so far. In our last update, we announced a firmware update which aimed to address some of the common issues that have been raised. 
Initially, the update required access to a Bluetooth compatible Windows 10 machine. We know that not everyone has access to Windows 10 and so our team has been busy working on an alternative method. I am happy to announce that we now have in place TWO new methods to allow you to update your ProPoint, using either an iOS or Android device.

Hi Backers,
Happy New Year to you all.
In my last message to you just before Christmas I wrote to tell you that we’d found the source of the disconnecting issue and that we’d created a new version of firmware to resolve this. Over Christmas and the New Year, most of our team took some well-deserved time off to enjoy their Summer holidays with friends and family (yes, it’s Summer here in New Zealand!) With 2019 now well and truly upon us, they’re all back in the office and hard at work on various tasks, the major one being the new firmware update.

Hi Backers,
I’m really pleased to inform you we’ve been able to track down and fix the issues around ProPoint disconnecting. We’ve also been able to solve reported issues over gesture control and the connections swapping between Bluetooth and the dongle receiver. I appreciate the help and support from the beta users over the last couple of weeks. Thank you.
Given a number of our team are on holiday during the Christmas break we’ve decided to delay the update process until mid-January when we’ll be better able to offer support to you.
